name: Carrot Adlai Garlic Rice
description: This Carrot Adlai Garlic Rice recipe is a wholesome, healthified dish perfect for those following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. With its harmony of savory garlic, sweet carrots, and nutty Adlai rice, it's a nutritious side dish that doesn't skimp on flavor. Ideal for anyone looking to enjoy healthy recipes without compromising on taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Adlai Rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the Adlai Rice according to package instructions until tender, typically around 20 minutes, then set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and dice the carrots into small cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a pan over medium heat and add the minced garlic and diced carrots. Cook until the carrots are softened, about 5-7 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the cooked Adlai Rice with the saut√©ed garlic and carrots. Stir well.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
